statements: UPDATE BalanceMonitor SET current_balance = 1500 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE BalanceMonitor SET transaction_type = 'WITHDRAWAL', transaction_amount = 100, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE BalanceMonitor SET transaction_amount = 500.00, current_balance = current_balance - 500.00 WHERE id = 100;
UPDATE BalanceMonitor SET current_balance = current_balance + 1000.00, transaction_type = 'credit' WHERE account_number = 200;
UPDATE account_balances SET balance = 5000.00 WHERE account_id = 1234;

UPDATE account_balances SET balance = balance - 100 WHERE account_id = 12345;
UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = amount + 50, transaction_date = '2022-06-30 15:30:00' WHERE transaction_id = 67890;

UPDATE transaction_history SET amount = 500.75, transaction_type = 'Withdrawal' WHERE transaction_id = 67890;
